00032 namespace cupp {
00033 
00037 struct SharedPointerReferenceCount {
00038         typedef size_t size_type;
00039 
00040         explicit SharedPointerReferenceCount(): referenceCount_( 1 ) {
00041         // Nothing to do.
00042         }
00043 
00044         size_type referenceCount_;
00045 };
00046 
00047 
00062 template< typename T >
00063 class shared_device_pointer {
00064 public:
00065         typedef size_t             size_type;
00066         typedef T                  value_type;
00067         typedef value_type&        reference;
00068         typedef value_type const&  const_reference;
00069         typedef value_type*        pointer;
00070         typedef value_type const*  const_pointer;
00071 
00072         template< typename U > friend class shared_device_pointer;
00073 
00074 
00082         shared_device_pointer() : data_( 0 ), referenceCount_( new SharedPointerReferenceCount() ) {
00083                 // Nothing to do.
00084         }
00085 
00093         explicit shared_device_pointer( T* _data ) : data_( _data ), referenceCount_( new SharedPointerReferenceCount() ) {
00094                 // Nothing to do.
00095         }
00096 
00105         shared_device_pointer( shared_device_pointer const& other ) : data_( other.data_ ), referenceCount_( other.referenceCount_ ) {
00106                 retain();
00107         }
00108 
00118         template< typename U >
00119         shared_device_pointer( shared_device_pointer< U > const& other ) : data_( other.data_ ), referenceCount_( other.referenceCount_ ) {
00120                 retain();
00121         }
00122 
00130         ~shared_device_pointer() {
00131                 release();
00132         }
00133 
00140         shared_device_pointer& operator=( shared_device_pointer other ) {
00141                 swap( other );
00142                 return *this;
00143         }
00144 
00150         void swap( shared_device_pointer& other ) {
00151                 std::swap( data_, other.data_ );
00152                 std::swap( referenceCount_, other.referenceCount_ );
00153         }
00154 
00155         size_type useCount() const {
00156                 return referenceCount_->referenceCount_;
00157         }
00158 
00168         pointer get() const {
00169                 return data_;
00170         }
00171 
00178         void reset( T* _data = 0 ) {
00179                 shared_device_pointer( _data ).swap( *this );
00180         }
00181 
00182 
00187         typedef T* (shared_device_pointer::*unspecified_bool_type)() const;
00188 
00197         operator unspecified_bool_type () const {
00198                 return 0 == data_ ? 0 : &shared_device_pointer::get;
00199         }
00200 
00201 
00202         template< typename U >
00203         bool operator<( shared_device_pointer< U > const& rhs ) {
00204                 // Because of sub-typing two different pointers might
00205                 // nonetheless point to the same class instance. Therefore use
00206                 // the reference count pointer for comparisons.
00207                 return referenceCount_ < rhs.referenceCount_;
00208         }
00209 
00210 
00217         template< typename U >
00218         inline friend shared_device_pointer< U > static_pointer_cast( shared_device_pointer const& sp ) {
00219                 return sp.static_pointer_cast< U >();
00220         }
00221 
00222 
00229         template< typename U >
00230         inline friend shared_device_pointer< U > const_pointer_cast( shared_device_pointer const& sp ) {
00231                 return sp.const_pointer_cast< U >();
00232         }
00233 
00240         template< typename U >
00241         inline friend shared_device_pointer< U > dynamic_pointer_cast( shared_device_pointer const& sp ) {
00242                 return sp.dynamic_pointer_cast< U >();
00243 
00244         }
00245 
00246 
00247 
00248 
00249 
00250 private:
00251 
00263         void release() {
00264                 assert( 0 < referenceCount_->referenceCount_ && "Only call release for reference counts greater than 0." );
00265 
00266                 --( referenceCount_->referenceCount_ );
00267                 if ( 0 == referenceCount_->referenceCount_ ) {
00268                         cupp::free(data_);
00269                         data_ = 0;
00270                         delete referenceCount_;
00271                         referenceCount_ = 0;
00272                 }
00273         }
00274 
00281         void retain() {
00282                 ++( referenceCount_->referenceCount_ );
00283         }
00284 
00285 
00289         shared_device_pointer( T* _data, SharedPointerReferenceCount* _referenceCount ) : data_( _data ), referenceCount_( _referenceCount ) {
00290                 retain();
00291         }
00292 
00293 
00303         template< typename U >
00304         shared_device_pointer< U > static_pointer_cast() const {
00305                 return shared_device_pointer< U >( static_cast< U* >( get() ), referenceCount_ );
00306         }
00307 
00317         template< typename U >
00318         shared_device_pointer< U > const_pointer_cast() const {
00319                 return shared_device_pointer< U >( const_cast< U* >( get() ), referenceCount_ );
00320         }
00321 
00331         template< typename U >
00332         inline shared_device_pointer< U > dynamic_pointer_cast() const {
00333                 U* castPointer = dynamic_cast< U* >( get() );
00334 
00335                 if ( 0 == castPointer ) {
00336                         return shared_device_pointer< U >();
00337                 }
00338 
00339                 return shared_device_pointer< U >( castPointer, referenceCount_ );
00340         }
00341

00343 private:
00344         pointer data_;
00345         SharedPointerReferenceCount* referenceCount_;
00346 }; // class shared_device_pointer

00351 template< typename T, typename U >
00352 bool operator==( shared_device_pointer< T > const& lhs, shared_device_pointer< U > const& rhs ) {
00353         return lhs.get() == rhs.get();
00354 }

00384 template< typename T >
00385 void swap( shared_device_pointer< T >& lhs, shared_device_pointer< T >& rhs ) {
00386         lhs.swap( rhs );
